article.title: Introduction
article.p: Some of the devices can have 'back' button or a gesture which should show previous page.
Using this module you can handle for such actions or finally close the app, if there is no previous page to go.
Install it by typing npm i @neftio/back-press and later use it by const backPress = require('@neftio/back-press').

signal.p: Is called any time, user want's to see previous page.

method.p: It's common pattern to close the app if there is no previous page to go.
